about_the_game:
Explore a steep archipelago with ancient Roman remains covered with vegetation, lost for centuries between white cliffs. Immerse yourself in these magnificent semi-open environments and solve puzzles to understand the reasons for your coming to these forgotten lands.

Walk, run, jump, swim, climb or ride a horse, use your torch in dark environments or use a rope to climb higher. Your freedom to move is complete!

Adventure game, puzzles and platforms in the first person, explore fabulous and vertical landscapes. Use your environment to progress and solve puzzles based on the technological level of the Romans era. Learn to move between these rugged cliffs and monumental Roman buildings.

Inspired by the Calanques in France, the game environment is intended to be as faithful as possible to these magnificent landscapes, close to the city of Marseille.

Intense research and great care have been taken in the realization of the Roman constructions in order to best correspond to the reconstruction of these imposing buildings.
detailed_description:
Explore a steep archipelago with ancient Roman remains covered with vegetation, lost for centuries between white cliffs. Immerse yourself in these magnificent semi-open environments and solve puzzles to understand the reasons for your coming to these forgotten lands.

Walk, run, jump, swim, climb or ride a horse, use your torch in dark environments or use a rope to climb higher. Your freedom to move is complete!

Adventure game, puzzles and platforms in the first person, explore fabulous and vertical landscapes. Use your environment to progress and solve puzzles based on the technological level of the Romans era. Learn to move between these rugged cliffs and monumental Roman buildings.

Inspired by the Calanques in France, the game environment is intended to be as faithful as possible to these magnificent landscapes, close to the city of Marseille.

Intense research and great care have been taken in the realization of the Roman constructions in order to best correspond to the reconstruction of these imposing buildings.

fullgame.name: Reliefs The Time of the Lemures

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04 and CentOS 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.5Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2GB) or AMD Radeon R9 270
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Motherboard integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: Game is compatible with Gamepad Microsoft Xbox 360 controller
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04 and CentOS 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 3.4Ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Motherboard integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: Game is compatible with Gamepad Microsoft Xbox 360 controller

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel i5 2.5Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2GB) or AMD Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Motherboard integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: Game is compatible with Gamepad Microsoft Xbox 360 controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 3.4Ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: Visit the monumental Roman ruins, forgotten by everyone. Make your way through towering cliffs. Solve puzzles based on the technological level of the Roman era in order to understand why you arrived in its enchanting landscapes.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
